Curse Strike.name: Curse Strike
Curse Strike.flavor: Your strike delivers a dark curse, debilitating your foe and lending power to your next attack.
Curse Strike.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, the target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls, and your weapon attacks against the target deal 2d6 extra damage.

Hellforged Blade.name: Hellforged Blade
Hellforged Blade.flavor: Runes of red fire begin glowing on your weapon. Each foe you strike bursts into flame and is assailed by supernatural dread.
Hellforged Blade.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is marked, takes a -2 penalty to all defenses, and takes ongoing 10 fire damage (save ends all).
Hellforged Blade.onMiss: Half damage, and ongoing 5 fire damage (save ends).

Avernian Challenge.name: Avernian Challenge
Avernian Challenge.flavor: You teleport a short distance and challenge nearby enemies.
Avernian Challenge.effect: You teleport 5 squares and then mark each enemy adjacent to you until the end of your next turn.
